name: Cryptocurrency. Create your own Bitcoin
description:
Cryptocurrency. Create your own Bitcoin is a clicker game in which you have to create your own cryptocurrency.

During the game, you will have to improve your cryptocurrency with the money you earn to increase your income.

Hackers can rob you at any time! To prevent this from happening, it is worth improving the protection.

Also in the game there are competitors that you have to buy out and become even richer! But they also do not stand still and become more expensive. Your goal is to buy out all the competitors!

-The game has a short training in Russian and English.

Good luck!
